column4: I can't seem to get DNS under Hardy, and network-admin doesn't work.  Any settings I put in just disappear as soon as I close it.  /etc/resolv.conf exists, but it's a directory.  I'm not entirely sure what to do.
Is there any command that will automagically generate a new resolv.conf, perhaps?
you said /etc/resolv.conf was a directly, is there anything in the directory?
